Hi there! I am a postdoctoral researcher at the [Department of Political Science](https://politicalscience.ku.dk/), University of Copenhagen, who is interested in political behavior, voters, public opinion, and representation, especially in the **climate** context. 

I defended my PhD dissertation, '*Political Weather: How experiencing climate change shapes our political lives*', in January 2024. Read the abstract or download the **thesis** [here](https://soerendamsbo.github.io/phd-thesis.html).

Currently, I work with Karina Kosiara-Pedersen and Christina Fiig on the *Democratic Implications of Political Harassment and Sexism (DIPAS)*. I also collaborate with Kasper M. Hansen on the *Danish Turnout Project*. Find my **research** [here](https://soerendamsbo.github.io/research.html).
